title: New plans to make switching suppliers easier for consumers (BIS - UK Department for Business ...
text: ( Source : BIS - UK Department for Business Innovations & Skills) Consumers should be able to switch their electricity or gas supplier, bank accounts, telephones, broadband or TV providers quickly, without charge and have the data on how
